body: Yep, freakycreeps is telling the truth

So you are saying only a girl can stolen, but a guy can't. Double standards are strong in that statement. Netorare means to have your loved one stolen from you, keyword "loved one" not just male or female. NTR doesn't discriminate against genders. Guys can be stolen by women or even by another guy, hell a woman can be stolen by another woman.
NTR usually has a female character as the one who is cheating on her husband or boyfriend, but it can also be a male character as well sleeping with other girls
No it does not count as netorare for it to be netorare teh mc needs to be male
This count as netorare, like it or not...guys can be stolen just like chicks
